ygData.subject: Re: hello? :)
ygData.msgSnippet: I know what you mean.  I just made 29 this morning and went off to get my spells.  I had 15 points all saved up so I dummped them all into research. Whats even
ygData.messageBody:
I know what you mean. I just made 29 this morning and went off to get my
spells. I had 15 points all saved up so I dummped them all into research.
Whats even more cool was seeing my first blue cyclops hehe abd an avocet
that was white tu me.

I have turned down the dark parh though to get where i am. I am killing
treants and will never be able to go to Qeynos again...Oh well I am from
Freeport. The pull is so strong theough I went from 27 to 29 in 2 days of
play.(about 16 hrs., its my day off ok) This is the fastest I have ever
leveled.and I have more coin than ever before too. Guess if I ever want to
go to Qeynos again I wil have to make bandits and gnolls extimct
